title: Quantum Architecture Search Experiment Log Entry
description: Schema for logging experiment results from DRL and EA quantum architecture search methods

eval_id.description: Unique identifier for this evaluation within the run

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this log entry was created

method.description: Method used: 'drl' for Deep Reinforcement Learning (arXiv:2407.20147), 'ea' for Evolutionary Algorithm (coevolutionary)

best_fidelity.description: Best fidelity achieved so far in this run (0 to 1)

gate_count.description: Total number of gates in the circuit

wall_time_s.description: Wall clock time in seconds since start of run

cum_eval_count.description: Cumulative number of circuit evaluations so far

unitary_hash.description: Hash of the circuit unitary matrix for deduplication/verification (optional)

notes.description: Additional notes or metadata about this evaluation (optional)

cnot_count.description: Number of CNOT/CX gates in the circuit (optional)
